briefTitle: A Study to Determine if 0.6% ISV-403 is Safe and Effective in the Treatment of Bacterial Conjunctivitis.
officialTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Clinical and Microbial Efficacy of 0.6% ISV-403 Compared to Vehicle in the Treatment of Bacterial Conjunctivitis.
summary: Evaluation of the clinical and microbial efficacy of 0.6% ISV-403, compared to vehicle in the treatment of bacterial conjunctivitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinical Resolution of Baseline Bacterial Conjunctivitis
